properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland.
properties.longDescription: The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors.
properties.longDescription: Includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room.

properties.description: Stunning four bedroom detached house with a large garden and garage. Recently renovated to a high standard.
properties.longDescription: Features a spacious open-plan living area, modern kitchen with island, and a master bedroom with en-suite. Located in a quiet cul-de-sac, perfect for families.

properties.description: Modern one bedroom apartment in the heart of the city center. Ideal for professionals.
properties.longDescription: Includes a balcony with city views, concierge service, and access to a residents' gym. Close to major transport links.

properties.description: Luxurious five bedroom detached home with swimming pool and landscaped gardens.
properties.longDescription: Offers expansive living space, a cinema room, and a double garage. Situated in a prestigious gated community.

properties.description: Spacious two bedroom flat with period features and high ceilings. Located near parks and cafes.
properties.longDescription: Recently updated kitchen and bathroom. Shared garden access. Excellent transport links to central London.

properties.description: Characterful three bedroom cottage with a charming garden. Peaceful location.
properties.longDescription: Original fireplaces, wooden beams, and a country-style kitchen. Close to local amenities and schools.
